name: Surprise PartE
description:
This short walking sim was made for RMIT's Game Design course! 

For this assignment, I was told to only use the assets of others! None of my own code or art was used. Could you tell?

This project took a couple of days and came from a brain fart idea.

There's no main menu, options or anything like that. Boot up and play and press Alt + F4 to Quit.
